message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm willing to part with it for $13,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within $15,000. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $12,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget considerations.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This product truly is exceptional and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
